basics.name: Yuzuki Fujimoto
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

highlights: Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

work.position: IT Risk and Controls Management Intern
work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Attend and take notes at general and SOX meetings.

Create learning materials to educate different business units on how they interact with confidential information and associate them to different risks involved through intensive research and interviews.
Compiled phishing emails through PhishER KnowBe4.
Demonsrated understanding of ERA(Engagement risk assessments) and Vendor risk management.
Proficiently manage travel logistics for professors and graduate assistants within the PEPS department, utilizing RCUH and Etravel systems to create travel request forms and travel completions.
Process reimbursement requests, meticulously tracking and verifying expenses paid out of pocket as well as mileage claims, ensuring accuracy and timeliness.
Contribute to the efficient functioning of the office by providing essential administrative support, including handling IDOs (Internal Department Orders) and collecting mail.
Demonstrate strong data entry skills, consistently inputting and maintaining large volumes of critical information with precision and speed, meeting strict time constraints.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more.
